cgu.selectCountry: Please click on your country to see your Terms of use:

closingScreen.thankYouForUsing: Thank you for using the {{branding}} application.
closingScreen.areYouSatisfied: Are you satisfied with the {{branding}} application?
closingScreen.doYouWantTo: Do you want to leave a comment?

consultation.plsKeepThisOpenPage: Please keep this page open, the session will start in a few minutes.
consultation.youAreNowInConsultation: You are now in session with
consultation.youAreInWaiting: We are putting you through, please wait.
consultation.yourBrowserDoesNotSupport: Your browser does not support the audio element.
consultation.joinCallDescription: The call for this session is already on going, do you want to join the call now?

login.translationRequestAccepted: Thank you for the confirmation, you will receive the information via email very soon.
login.translationRequestRefused: Thank you for your feedback, we will inform the caregiver of the unavailability.
login.homeIsAHUGTeleconsultation: {{branding}} is a remote audio/video call system. You are about to join a remote session. Please do not leave this page once the session request is in progress.
login.theInvitationIsNotOrNoLongerValide: This invitation link is no longer valid or has already been used. The requester will send you another invitation.
login.thisApplicationIsIntented: This application is intended to work via an invitation link. Click on this link beforehand to open a session.
login.ifYouReceivedThisInvitation: If you received this invitation, copy and paste the received link into your browser or copy the invitation key here:
login.thisAppOnlyWorksByInivitation: This application only works by invitation. Please use the session link that your caregiver has sent you.
login.pleaseWaitWhileYourRequest: Please wait while your request is being processed.
login.addTheEventToYourCalendar: Add the event to your calendar
login.theRemoteServerIsNotReachable: The remote server cannot be reached, please check your connectivity

translatorForm.youAboutToJoinInviteWithPatientAndDOctor: {{branding}} is a remote video/audio call system. You are about to accept an online appointment with a Service user and caregiver.
translatorForm.pleaseFillYourInfo: Please fill in the information below so that we can contact you with access to the session.
translatorForm.name: First and last name
translatorForm.nameIsRequired: Please enter the interpreter’s first and last name
translatorForm.directNumberIsRequired: Please enter a direct phone number
translatorForm.directNumberIsInvalid: The number must be in the international format 00XX or + XX

closeConsultation.youAreAboutTo:
You are about to cancel the session request. If you cancel at this level, you will lose your position in the queue and you will have to re-request a session.


Are you sure you want to cancel?

test.yourDeviceSeems: Your device seems to be perfectly compatible with this system. If the video preview is not of sufficient quality or is choppy, please check that your equipment signal is sufficient.
test.youCanStillJoin: You can still join session but video/audio call might fails.
test.micDenied: Access to camera seems working but access to the microphone is denied.
test.cameraDenied: Access to microphone seems working but access to the camera is denied.
test.bothDenied: Access to camera and microphone is denied.
test.micAndCamRequesting: The system needs to have access to your camera and microphone to work properly. Please ensure to accept permission request.
test.permissionError: We have encountered a problem for accessing to your camera or your microphone. Please ensure the devices are properly connected.

videoRoom.needAccess: We need access to your microphone or camera to continue the call.

authenticate.sso_text: Login with your single sign-on credentials
authenticate.access_permits: This access permits to request session on {{branding}}.

register.by_checking_box: By clicking the tickbox, you accept the
register.own_account: Own already an account ? Login here

dashboard.no_consultation: You have no session yet. Use the button below to open new session request.
dashboard.no_consultation_history: You have no session in history yet.

request_consultation.request_form_title: Once submitted, you will be redirected automatically in the session request. You will able to cancel until an expert will handle the request.

common.connectionFailed: The connection to the server is not functioning properly, and you can no longer receive session requests. If the issue persists, refresh the page.

acknowledgeInvite.subTitle: Thank you for acknowledging this invite! You can now test your browser compatibility.
acknowledgeInvite.errorDescription: This acknowledgement link is no longer valid or has already been used.
